GSD.product_version: versions from v3.15 to before v4.14.304
GSD.description:
usb: xhci: Check endpoint is valid before dereferencing it

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.304 by commit 375be2dd61a072f7b1cac9b17eea59e07b58db3a, it was introduced in version v3.15 by commit 50e8725e7c429701e530439013f9681e1fa36b5d. For more details please see the references link.
